subject: Public Speaking
title: Martin Luther: Reformation Speech
description: A quick win: understand Martin Luther: Reformation Speech.

hook.text: Luther nailed 95 theses to a church door. A protest. A defiance.

buildup.text: His speeches challenged the most powerful institution in Europe.

discovery.text: Luther used the printing press to amplify his voice.

twist.text: One person's arguments against corruption sparked revolution.

climax.text: Clarity of conviction can overcome institutional power.

punchline.text: Speak truth to power. It might reshape the world.
